islab.parvecmf.factorizer - package islab.parvecmf.factorizer
 

P

ParVecMFFactorizer - Class in islab.parvecmf.factorizer
Implements the ParVecMF methodology, as described in "ParVecMF: A Paragraph Vector-based Matrix Factorization Recommender System" and in "From Free-text User Reviews to Product Recommendation using Paragraph Vectors and Matrix Factorization".
ParVecMFFactorizer(DataModel, IDMigrator, int, String, String, int, double, double, double, int) - Constructor for class islab.parvecmf.factorizer.ParVecMFFactorizer
Create the factorizer
